scripts.deploy: npm run gzip && s3-cli --region=us-west-2 --config .s3 -P --delete-removed --add-header="Cache-Control:public,max-age=3600" --add-header=Content-Encoding:gzip sync ./site s3://docs.losant.com/ && npm run gunzip
scripts.deploy:prerelease: mkdocs build --clean && PYENV_VERSION=2.7 gsutil -m rsync -c -R ./site gs://docs.prerelease.losant.com
